General.Name: Algoltek Inc
General.Description: Algoltek, Inc. provides building bloc IPs in Taiwan. The company offers solutions for video conversion in various formats, such as MHL, HDMI, VGA, DisplayPort, and type-C ALT mode; ASIC solutions for switching/splitting video signal between sink and source devices; signal extension and redriver solutions; and protocol controls for power transmission application. It also provides design assistance that enables IC designers to accelerate SoC designs from planning to SoC silicon. Algoltek, Inc. was founded in 2010 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.
